name: the sisyphean man
description:
Ludum Dare 47, Theme ' Stuck in a loop ', the Compo 

The one who repeat everything he just did, like a twisted clockwork, and the loop comes from human's greed.

With the topic loop, you need to make use of the 5 seconds control chance, plot out a route and reach the goal.

It just works. Wish less bug......The time loop system coding seems a little tricky for me (

Control: 

Direction key——Move and Jump

R——Restart

Tab——Loop

If find you cant move, dont worry, this is a part of Game; just Try Press Tab
